In a few weeks, X/Twitter will start paying creators for ads served in their replies. First block payment totals $5M.

Note, the creator must be verified and only ads served to verified users count.

A number of political shows and podcasts have announced their intention to upload on Twitter alongside, or even in place of, Youtube. This new move by Youtube may be intended to stem the bleeding.
